name: Void Eternal
description:
Void Eternal is a strategic God-game with rogue-like elements.
You are a god watching over the people of Light and the people of Darkness, interlocked in an everlasting struggle for resources and survival.

You have to carefully balance the expansionism of the people of Light, building up their economy and exploiting the resources of the land, with the aggressiveness of the people of Darkness, constantly attacking and collecting the Souls of their enemies.

The world is flat, the people of Light living on the upper side, the people of Darkness living on the lower side. You have to expand the land into the Void surrounding it and explore exotic parallel dimensions with unique properties.

While exploring the infinite, procedurally generated world, you will discover new resources, artifacts which can be researched to gain new technologies but also an old enemy who aims to wipe out both the people of Light and Darkness, leaving behind only eternal void.

System Requirements:
Processor: 2GHz or better
Memory: 2GB RAM or more
Graphics: Shader Model 4 capable Graphics card or better (OpenGL3 or DirectX 10 or better)
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
